testcase.name: :Verify Login for valid inputs and display message as Login Successful
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Sign in.................................................passed Then Login page is dislayed with title Rediffmail...........................passed When user enters user name password.........................................passed And clicks on Submit........................................................passed Then user gets connected users inbox and display message as Successful......passed

testcase.name: :Verify Login for invalid inputs and display error message
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Sign in.................................................passed Then Login page is dislayed with title Rediffmail...........................passed When enter invalid user name and valid password.............................passed And clicks on Submit........................................................passed Then Check for error message................................................passed When user enters valid user name and invalid password.......................passed Then Check for error message................................................passed
